about_the_game:
🌤 WOOD & WEATHER

Wood & Weather is a single player god-game created as a sandbox for introducing unplanned weather on a wooden toy city and dealing with the dramatic changes it causes over time.

👋 Play as an ethereal blue hand and with the aid of a ✨friendly wizard ✨, you have the ability to fly, walk, and manipulate the little open-world through unexpected physics-driven, toybox interactions

🏠 The small wooden people who make up the vibrant city are trying to make their place in the world. How much of a permanent effect will you have in their lives? Only time (and weather) will tell. 🌈

KEY FEATURES:

  • 👉 Take control of an ethereal god-like hand.
  • 🌦 Change the weather and see the various effects it has on the city and its people.
  • 💡 Impress and inspire the citizen to help fulfil their life aspirations.
  • 🪵 Interact with a clunky wooden toy city.
  • ☔️ Get to know the range of personalities who make up this tiny world.
  • 🍃 Exist in a lively dynamic open world that you can manipulate.
  • 🎷 Music by Dan Golding. (Untitled Goose Game, Frog Detective)
  • 🏡 Not exactly a city builder.
